item.title: Initial Commit: Open Bike
item.description: Codeberg Repository: https://codeberg.org/cyberme0w/open-bike F-Droid: https://f-droid.org/packages/dev.cyberme0w.openbike/ For the uninitiated, NextBike is a bike-sharing company. You can register with them and then simply rent a bike, use it, and return it. They’ve been around since 2004 and since then expanded into 20 countries. They were also recently acquired by Tier Mobility, which is famous for their e-scooters. I myself am a (mostly) happy customer of NextBike and enjoy their service, since for me it means I can freely use their bikes whenever I need, without having to think about maintenance or where to store the bike in my small appartment.
